Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

MILES_QUICK_MIDI_OPEN

The basic type MILES_QUICK_MIDI_OPEN describes how to open the MIDI system.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 0 Don't open the XMIDI system at all.
 1 Open the XMIDI system.
 AIL_QUICK_MIDI_AND_DLS Open the XMIDI system as well as the DLS software-synth.
 AIL_QUICK_DLS_ONLY Open the XMIDI system with the DLS software-synth only (no fallback to hardware MIDI).


Group: Quick Integration Services
Related Functions: AIL_quick_startup
